= Controllers =

 * Flyduino: 
it's an ATMega2560 based board. You will find it at the [http://www.flyduino.net Flyduino shop]. Here's a dedicated [http://www.rcgroups.com/forums/showthread.php?t=1381577 thread] about Flyduino products.

 * Seeeduino Mega:
an ATMega1280 based board, you will find it [http://www.seeedstudio.com/depot/seeeduino-v221-atmega-328p-p-669.html here].

 * Black Vortex:
it's a controller and IMU board, you will find it in this [http://www.ebay.com/sch/csg_and_rc_extreme/m.html?_nkw=&_armrs=1&_from=&_ipg=&_trksid=p3686 Ebay store].
